Key:
(In the end, I ended up going to the rooftop by
myself. I wanted to gather my thoughts about what
to do next.)

(Just as I was thinking this morning, I think the
biggest goal is for me to find Rio. That's the
least I can do for now.)
Well, I guess I'll have to go back to Takadai...

(Rather than letting things happen, I needed to take
action. It's way better than doing nothing at all.)
All right. I'm going to head over.

(Because I killed some time on the rooftop, everyone
else had already gone home.)

(Well, not everyone has memories of the past, so I'll
go on my own to keep from stressing them out. But if
they find out, I have a feeling they'll be mad... Hm?)
Is that...?!
...Papa!
Whoa! So you are the girl from yesterday...
Not just some girl. I'm Rio.
O-Oh, right... Rio. So what are you doing here?
I wanted to see you, Papa!
M-Me...? Oh, perfect. I wanted to see you, too.
Hehe... I'm so happy! Same as Paaapaaa ♪

(Well, it's true that I wanted to see her. I never
imagined that she'd be the one to find me.)
Marina isn't with you today?
Marina? Marina visits me when it gets dark outside!
I see. She's a nice girl.
Yeah, Marina's nice! She stays with Rio!
That's nice.

(Seems like Marina and Rio get along. I wonder why
it's only at night? I'm sure she's protecting Rio, but
there's no reason to be gone in the daytime...)

But if I'm with you Papa... I think it's more fun! So I
came to invite you.
Invite me?

Yes, invite! Papa, will you help me look for
something?
Oh, you mentioned it yesterday...

Yeah! The most important thing! Rio has to find it
here.
You have to find it here...

(If that has to do with Eden, it may be the base point
for the barrier like last time. But that's only if...
this girl is related to Rinne somehow.)
(I have to ask her if she's involved.)
Hey, Rio?
What, what, Papa?
Why do you call me Papa?
Why? Shido Itsuka is Rio's Papa. Papa is Papa.
Hmm, I see... I guess.

(Her answer was so vague that I couldn't help but
sigh. My question still hasn't been answered.)
What's the matter, Papa? Are you tired?
Oh, no, it's nothing. Can I ask you one more thing?
Sure. If Papa's going to help me!
Uh... okay. Only today, all right?
Okay!
So I want to ask you, Rio... Are you Rin―
Hey, isn't that Itsuka the sophomore?

He's with a little girl. He was rumored to be a
pedophile... Could it be...?
That's crazy!
Sorry, Rio. Can we take a walk?
Okay, got it.

(If we stay here, more annoying rumors could spread...
It's best that we get out of here.)

Okay, we got pretty far, so I think we're good now.
So Rio, I wanted to ask you...
Okay.
Do you have anything to do with Rinne?
Rinne? You mean... Rinne... Sonogami?

Yeah that's it. Rinne Sonogami. She has the same last
name as―
I wanna see her!
You wanna see her...? Rinne?
Oh... but I don't want to see her.
Which is it... So you do know Rinne?

Yeah I know her. I know her just as much as I know
you Papa.
Rinne Sonogami is Mama. Rio's mama.
M-Mama...?

Yup, Mama! Because I was able to see Papa, now I
want to see Mama.

(Rio's statement made my brain stop. I'm Papa... and
Rinne's Mama? What is going on?)

(Rinne and I aren't like that, and Rio looks like
she's in grade school. If that's the case, then that
means I did stuff when I was in elementary school...)

Rio wanted to go see Mama too. But Marina said I
can't. Rio is a good girl and keeping that promise.
I see... You really are a good girl, Rio.

(I softly patted her head. Rio looked happy and leaned
into me.)

(Rio is a child. There are many times when it's hard
to communicate with her.)

(From what Rio said, Marina seems to know what's
going on. It's best we kill some time and see Marina.)

There's still time before Marina comes, right? Then
why don't we go take a stroll?

Yeah! Strollliinnngg wittth Paaapaaa! Wiiiith Paaapaa!
Stroooll!
Hahaha... Rio, you're so energetic.
Yeah. Papa, you said that kids are best energetic.

Did I say that in front of you, Rio? Oh well. Then
let's head out.
